posts.post_content:
Morning Folks,

   Once again I have decided to pursue a T206 'back' collection.  Since I have a T213-2 and T215 of Joe Kelley, I figure I'll add some T206s to that mix.  I want to try and knock off some of the mid-difficult backs first.

Does anyone have a low-mid grade T206 Kelley for sale with any of the following backs?

American Beauty
El Principe De Gales
Tolstoi
Old Mill

If so, please email me at [url]richard@richardarmstrong.ca[/url] with front/back scans and your price.

Thanks!

Richard.
